sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-text-field
      v-model="note.title"
      label="Title"
      outlined
      filled
      clearable
    ></v-text-field>
    <v-textarea
      v-model="note.body"
      filled
      outlined
      auto-grow
    ></v-textarea>
    <v-btn v-on:click='updateNote($route.params.id)' color="teal lighten-1" dark> Save </v-btn>
    <v-btn v-on:click='deleteNote($route.params.id)' color="error">Delete</v-btn>
  </v-container>
  
</template>

<script>
import axios from "axios";

export default {
  name: "NotesList",

  data: function () {
    return {
      selectedItem: 1,
      note: null,
      message: null
    };
  },

  methods: {
    getNote: function (id) {
      axios
        .get(`http://localhost:3000/notes/${id}`)
        .then((response) => (this.note = response.data));
    },
    deleteNote: function(id){
      axios.delete(`http://localhost:3000/${id}`).then((response) => this.message = response.data)
    },
    updateNote: function (id) {
      axios
        .patch(`http://localhost:3000/notes/${id}`, note)
        .then((response) => (this.note = response.data));
    }
  },

  mounted: function () {
    this.getNote(this.$route.params.id);
  },
};
</script>
